metadata.title: CVE-2024-53159 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:hwmon: (nct6775-core) Fix overflows seen when writing limit attributesDIV_ROUND_CLOSEST() after kstrtoul() results in an overflow if a largenumber such as 18446744073709551615 is provided by the user.Fix it by reordering clamp_val() and DIV_ROUND_CLOSEST() operations.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
